attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why do we have charity organisations?
We are the 4/5th riches nation on this planet,so why do we have charities?
Why do we allow immigrants into the UK.
By having charities does that not say "hey we cant't afford to keep our own people how the hell do you expect us to keep immigrants....

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
